name: Balloon guy
description:
Balloon guy is an indie game with a strategy component.
You have to get the child to ascend to the end of the level, avoiding all the traps, and there are many levels!
You can move platforms and other objects, apart from stopping the child's ascent, to complete the level.

What to expect:

-Challenge and strategy levels

-Funny and relaxing gameplay

-Game perfect to all ages.

How to play:

-Mouse to click and move in the menu and in the game (interact with objets with mouse click too)
